localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Sprouter’s mission is to connect people and share life’s best moments faster than ever before while not only enhancing your overall social media experience, but the ecosystem of social media itself.
blogPost.body: Sprouter’s mission is to connect people and share life’s best moments faster than ever before while not only enhancing your overall social media experience, but the ecosystem of social media itself.
blogPost.title: Sprouter - Sprouter is the fastest way to share your social medias
blogPost.author: Tyler Peterson

localize.description: Sprouter的使命是比以往任何时候都更快地连接人们并分享生活中最美好的时刻，同时不仅提升你的整体社交媒体体验，而且提升社交媒体本身的生态系统。
localize.tagline: Sprouter是分享你的社交媒体的最快方式。

localize.description: Sprouter的使命是比以往任何時候都更快地連接人們並分享生活中最美好的時刻，同時不僅提升你的整體社交媒體體驗，而且提升社交媒體本身的生態系統。
localize.tagline: Sprouter是分享你的社交媒體的最快方式。

previous.excerpt: CLIP Playground lets you test OpenAI's new model CLIP from your browser. CLIP is a GPT-3 like AI you can use to perform a variety of tasks that pair both images and text.
previous.title: CLIP Playground - OpenAI's CLIP model in your browser, like GPT-3 for images

localize.description: CLIP Playground让你从浏览器中测试OpenAI的新模型CLIP。CLIP是一个类似于GPT-3的AI，你可以用它来执行各种图像和文本配对的任务。
localize.tagline: OpenAI的CLIP模型在你的浏览器中，就像GPT-3的图像一样。

localize.description: CLIP Playground讓你從瀏覽器中測試OpenAI的新模型CLIP。CLIP是一個類似於GPT-3的AI，你可以用它來執行各種圖像和文本配對的任務。
localize.tagline: OpenAI的CLIP模型在你的瀏覽器中，就像GPT-3的圖像一樣。

next.title: RT @SarahPonczek: S&P 500 down for a 5th day. That hasn’t happened since February 2020 👀

localize.full_text: RT @SarahPonczek: S&P 500指数连续5天下跌。自2020年2月以来还没有发生过这种情况👀。
